<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the GST exclusive market value of any non-monetary consideration; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	which is paid or provided by one party to another for any supply made under or in connection with this deed poll and includes any amount payable by way of indemnity,
	reimbursement, compensation or damages.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	PPSA
</B>
	means
<I>
	Personal Property Securities Act 2009
</I>
	(Cth).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Relevant Proportion
</B>
	means the Relevant Proportion set out opposite each Noteholder&#146;s name in schedule&nbsp;1.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Redemption
</B>
	means the redemption of a Note at its Face Value.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Redemption Date
</B>
	means any date upon which a Redemption occurs under clause 4.1.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Share
</B>
	means a fully-paid ordinary share in the capital of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Warranties
</B>
	means the warranties set out in schedule&nbsp;4.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Interpretation
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In this
	deed poll, except where the context otherwise requires:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the singular includes the plural and vice versa and a gender includes other genders;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	other grammatical forms of a defined word or expression have a corresponding meaning;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a clause, paragraph, schedule or annexure is to a clause or paragraph of or schedule or annexure to this deed poll and a reference to this deed poll
	includes any schedule and annexure;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a document or agreement, includes the document or agreement as novated, altered, supplemented or replaced from time to time;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to $ or cents is to Australian currency;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(f)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to time is to Sydney time;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(g)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a year (other than a financial year) or a month means a calendar year or calendar month respectively;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(h)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a party is to a party to this deed poll, and a reference to a party to a document includes the party&#146;s executors, administrators, successors and
	permitted assigns and substitutes;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a person includes a natural person, partnership, firm, body corporate, trust, joint venture, association, governmental or local authority or agency or
	other entity;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage281"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/10/27/0001193125-16-748662_G272985EX46PHDR.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(j)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a statute, ordinance, code or other law includes regulations and other instruments under it and consolidations, amendments, re-enactments or replacements
	of any of them;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(k)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the meaning of general words is not limited by specific examples introduced by including, for example or similar expressions;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(l)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a rule of construction does not apply to the disadvantage of a party because the party was responsible for the preparation of this deed poll or any part of it; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(m)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	if a day on or by which an obligation must be performed or an event must occur is not a Business Day, the obligation must be performed or the event must occur on or by
	the next Business Day.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Headings
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Headings are
	for ease of reference only and do not affect interpretation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	GST
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Expressions set out in italics in this clause 1.4 bear the same meaning as those expressions in the GST Law.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	All Payments have been set or determined without regard to the impact of GST.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Subject to clause 1.4(e), if the whole or any part of a Payment by a party (including amounts referred to in clause 1.4(d)) is the consideration for a
<I>
	taxable
	supply
</I>
	, the GST Amount in respect of the Payment must be paid to the supplier of the
<I>
	taxable supply
</I>
	as an additional amount, at the same time and in the same manner as the Payment is otherwise payable or as otherwise agreed in writing.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If a Payment due under this deed poll is a reimbursement or indemnification by one party of an expense, loss or liability incurred or to be incurred by the other party,
	the Payment will exclude any GST forming part of the amount to be reimbursed or indemnified to the extent to which the other party can claim an
<I>
	input tax credit
</I>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A party&#146;s obligation to make payment under clause 1.4(c) is subject to a valid tax invoice being delivered to the party liable to pay for the
<I>
	taxable
	supply
</I>
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(f)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Where the supplier has become subject to any penalties or interest because of a late payment by the supplier to the Australian Taxation Office of any GST Amount and
	that late payment is a result of the failure of the
<I>
	recipient
</I>
	to comply with the terms of this clause 1.4, the
<I>
	recipient
</I>
	must pay to the supplier
<I>
</I>
	an additional amount on demand equal to the amount of those penalties and
	interest.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(g)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The
<I>
	recipient
</I>
	must indemnify the supplier on demand in respect of all loss or damage arising from a breach by the
<I>
	recipient
</I>
	of its obligations under this
	clause 1.4.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage282"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/10/27/0001193125-16-748662_G272985EX46PHDR.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Notes
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	N
</B>
<B>
	otes
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Within 10
	Business Days after the date of this deed poll, and in full and final satisfaction and discharge of the Company&#146;s obligation to repay each Loan, including any accrued but unpaid interest on such Loan, the Company must:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	issue to each Noteholder that number of Notes set out in Schedule 1. For example, the Company will issue Andrew Heaton 28,831,101 Notes;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	deliver to the Noteholder a Note Certificate, duly executed by the Company, as evidence of the Notes issued to the Noteholder under clause 2.1(a); and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	record the name of the Noteholder in the Company&#146;s register of Noteholders, as the holder of the Notes issued under clause&nbsp;2.1(a).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	No interest
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	No interest
	will accrue or be payable on the Notes.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	No transfer
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Notes
	will be issued on the basis that a Noteholder may not Dispose of any rights, title or interest in any Note held by it, without the prior written consent of the Company. The Notes will not be quoted on ASX.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Termination of the Loan Agreement
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Upon the performance by the Company of its obligations under clause&nbsp;2.1, the obligation on the Company to pay the Outstanding Principal (as that term is defined in the Loan Agreement) and any accrued
	and unpaid interest on the Outstanding Principal under the Loan Agreement is released and discharged and the Loan Agreement is terminated.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Rights
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This document is
	a deed poll. The Company acknowledges and confirms in favour of the Noteholders that the obligations imposed on the Company under this document in relation to the Notes issued by the Company are owed to and are for the benefit of each Noteholder so
	that each such Noteholder has the benefit of, and is entitled to enforce, this document against the Company even though it is not party to, or is not in existence at the time of execution and delivery of, this deed.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	6
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage283"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/10/27/0001193125-16-748662_G272985EX46PHDR.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Enforcement
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Each
	Noteholder may enforce its rights under this deed independently from each other Noteholder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	General terms of issue of Notes
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Each of the Notes will:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	be convertible in the manner and at the times provided by clause 3 into Shares determined in accordance with clause&nbsp;3; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	be redeemable in the manner and at the times provided by clause 4.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Notes do not carry a right to vote at a general meeting of the Company, nor do they carry a right to dividends.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Status of Notes
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The
	Notes will constitute:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a debt owed by the Company; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	for the avoidance of doubt, shall rank ahead of all shareholders in the Company on a winding up or liquidation of the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Conversion
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Conversion
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Subject to
	clause&nbsp;3.2, at any time after a Conversion Event specified below, which must be notified by the Company to each Noteholder within 5 Business Days of such event, each Noteholder may at its option, by Notice to the Company setting out the number
	of Notes being converted (
<B>
	Notice of Conversion
</B>
	), convert a number of Notes held by it up to the Noteholder&#146;s Relevant Proportion of the Maximum Conversion Notes specified below into Shares at the Conversion Rate:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage284"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/10/27/0001193125-16-748662_G272985EX46PHDR.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	For the removal of doubt and by way of example, after the first Conversion Event, Andrew
	Heaton will be entitled to convert 7,688,294 Notes.&nbsp;The entitlements of each Noteholder to convert Shares in Tranches 1, 2 and 3 are set out in schedule 2.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Early Conversion
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a third party acquires the beneficial interest in more than 50% of the issued Shares; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the transaction under which the third party acquires the interest described in paragraph 3(a) values the Company at $20,000,000 or more,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	then the Notes which have not already been Converted may be Converted by each Noteholder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Note
</B>
<B>
	Certificate
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If the Noteholder gives a valid Notice of Conversion, the Noteholder must deliver to the Company, at the same time, its then current Note
	Certificate for cancellation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Shares
</B>
<B>
	issued on Conversion
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company, having received both a Notice of Conversion and the relevant Note Certificate in accordance with clause&nbsp;3.3, must within 10 Business Days after the date of receipt of those documents:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	cancel that Note Certificate;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	deliver to the Noteholder a new Note Certificate taking into account the Face Value of any Notes converted into Shares, and update its register of Noteholders
	accordingly;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	issue and allot the relevant number of Shares to the Noteholder, in accordance with that Notice of Conversion;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	deliver to the Noteholder a holding statement as evidence of the Shares issued to the Noteholder under clause 3.4(c), and otherwise comply with the ASX Listing Rules in
	respect of the Shares.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	3.5

	Valid Notice of Conversion

<A NAME="eolPage285"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Redemption
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Redemption dates
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Each
	Noteholder may with 30 Business Days prior Notice to the Company (
<B>
	Redemption Notice
</B>
	), redeem unConverted Notes on the earlier of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	where Notes have become eligible for Conversion by the Noteholder, upon the expiry of three months from the date the Notes becoming so eligible (for the removal of
	doubt, the Noteholder may only redeem the Notes under this paragraph (i) which are eligible for Conversion); and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	an Event of Default by the Company.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	4.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Note Certificate
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	On the
	service of a Redemption Notice, on the relevant Redemption Date:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Noteholder must deliver its then current Note Certificate to the Company for cancellation;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Company must pay the Face Value of the Notes being redeemed in Immediately Available Funds to the relevant Noteholder; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Company must cancel the&nbsp;relevant Note Certificate and issue a new Note Certificate to the Noteholder taking into account the Face Value of any Notes redeemed,
	and update its register of Noteholders accordingly.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Compliance with Listing Rules
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	is entitled to amend the terms of this deed on the reorganisation of the capital of the Company provided that the amendment:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	is made at the time of the reorganisation only to ensure compliance with the listing rules of the ASX applying to a reorganisation of capital; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	does not unfairly prejudice the Noteholder.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	may only reorganise its capital if in the case of the Notes, the number of Notes or the Conversion price, or both, is reorganised so that the Noteholder will not
	receive a benefit that holders of Shares do not receive.&nbsp;This does not include rounding up of the number of Shares to be received on Conversion if the rounding up is approved at the Shareholders&#146; meeting which approves the reorganisation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	9
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage286"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/10/27/0001193125-16-748662_G272985EX46PHDR.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Warranties
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company
	gives the Warranties in favour of each Noteholder as at the date of this deed poll.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Notices
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Service of notices
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A
	notice, demand, consent, approval or communication under this deed poll (
<B>
	Notice
</B>
	):
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	must be in writing and directed to the recipient&#146;s address for notices specified in the Details (as varied by any Notice); and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	must be hand delivered, left at or sent by prepaid post or facsimile to the recipient&#146;s address for notices specified in the Details (as varied by any Notice).
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Effective on receipt
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A
	Notice given in accordance with clause 7.1 takes effect when received (or at a later time specified in it), and is taken to be received:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	if hand delivered or left at the recipient&#146;s address, on delivery;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	if sent by prepaid post, the third Business Day after the date of posting, or the seventh Business Day after the date of posting if posted to or from outside
	Australia); and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	if sent by facsimile, when the sender&#146;s facsimile system generates a message confirming successful transmission of the entire Notice unless, within one Business
	Day after the transmission, the recipient informs the sender that it has not received the entire Notice,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	but if
	the delivery or transmission under paragraph (a) or (c) is outside Business Hours, the Notice is taken to be received at the commencement of Business Hours after that delivery, receipt or transmission.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Process service
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Any
	process or other document relating to litigation, administrative or arbitral proceedings in relation to this deed poll may be served by any method contemplated by this clause in addition to any means authorised by law.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	General
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Alterations
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This deed
	poll may be altered only in writing signed by the Company pursuant to clause 5 or otherwise with the consent of those Noteholders holding at least 75% of the Notes, provided that the rights of a Noteholder may not be reduced without the written
	consent of the Noteholder.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	10
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage287"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="RIGHT">
<IMG SRC="http://content.edgar-online.com/edgar_conv_img/2016/10/27/0001193125-16-748662_G272985EX46PHDR.JPG" ALT="LOGO">
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Approvals and consents
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Except where this deed poll expressly states otherwise, a party may, in its discretion, give conditionally or unconditionally or withhold
	any approval or consent under this deed poll.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Assignment
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A Noteholder
	may only assign this deed poll or a right under this deed poll with the prior written consent of the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Costs
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The parties agree
	that each party shall bear its own costs in relation to, and associated with, this deed poll and giving effect to the agreement save that any stamp duty assessed on this deed poll will be paid by the Company.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Severability
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If the
	whole or any part of a provision of this deed poll is invalid or unenforceable in a jurisdiction it must, if possible, be read down for the purposes of that jurisdiction so as to be valid and enforceable.&nbsp;If however, the whole or any part of a
	provision of this deed poll is not capable of being read down, it is severed to the extent of the invalidity or unenforceability without affecting the remaining provisions of this deed poll or affecting the validity or enforceability of that
	provision in any other jurisdiction.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Survival
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Any other term
	which by its nature is intended to survive termination of this deed poll survives termination of this deed poll.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Attorneys
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Each person
	who executed this deed poll on behalf of a party declares that he or she has no notice of the revocation or suspension by the grantor or in any other manner of the power of attorney under the authority of which he or she executes this deed poll.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Waiver
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A party does not
	waive a right, power or remedy if it fails to exercise or delays in exercising the right, power or remedy.&nbsp;A single or partial exercise by a party of a right, power or remedy does not prevent another or further exercise of that or another
	right, power or remedy.&nbsp;A waiver of a right, power or remedy must be in writing and signed by the party giving the waiver.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	11
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage288"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.9
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Remedies cumulative
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The
	rights provided in this deed poll are cumulative with and not exclusive of the rights, powers or remedies provided by law independently of this deed poll.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.10
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Governing law
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This deed
	poll will be governed by and construed in accordance with the law for the time being in force in New South Wales and the parties submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of that State.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.11
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Exercise of rights
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A
	party may exercise a right, at its discretion and separately or concurrently with another right.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The execution, delivery and performance by the Company of this deed poll:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	complies with its constitution or other constituent documents; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	does not constitute a breach of any law or obligation or cause or result in a default under any agreement or Encumbrance by which it is bound and which would prevent it
	from entering into and performing its obligations under this deed poll.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	All necessary authorisations for the execution, delivery and performance by the Company of this deed poll in accordance with its terms have been obtained.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company has full power and capacity to own its own assets and to enter into and perform its obligations under this deed poll.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company is validly incorporated, organised and subsisting in accordance with the laws of its place of incorporation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company enters into and performs this deed poll on its own account and not as trustee for or nominee of any other person.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company&#146;s obligations under this deed poll are enforceable in accordance with its terms.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:3PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:2PX;BORDER-BOTTOM:0.5PT SOLID #000000">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Solvency
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	No:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	meeting has been convened, resolution proposed, petition presented or order made for the winding-up or dissolution of the Company and no circumstances exist which would
	give rise to such resolution, petition or order;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	administrator, receiver, receiver and manager, provisional liquidator, liquidator or other officer of the court has been appointed or is threatened or expected to be
	appointed in relation to all or any material asset of the Company and there are no circumstances justifying such an appointment;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	mortgagee or chargee has taken, attempted or indicated an intention to exercise its rights under any security of which the Company is the mortgagor or chargor; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	writ of execution has been issued against the Company or any of the Company&#146;s property and there are no circumstances justifying such a writ.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Company:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	has not gone into liquidation, passed a winding-up resolution or received a deregistration notice under section 601AB of the Corporations Act or applied for
	deregistration under section 601AA of the Corporations Act;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	is not insolvent within the meaning of section 95A of the Corporations Act and no circumstances exist which would require a court to presume that the Company is
	insolvent for the purposes of section 95A of the Corporations Act;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	has not entered or taken any steps to enter and do not propose to enter into any arrangement, compromise or assumption with or assignment for the benefit of its
	creditors or a class of them;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	has not stopped, suspended or threatened to stop or suspend paying its debts as and when they fall due; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	(e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	is not subject to administration under Part 5.3A of the Corporations Act.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_4_7"></A>
