</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	it is obtained lawfully from a third party without any breach of confidentiality;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	it is already known by the recipient party (as shown by its written records) before the date of disclosure to it;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	it is independently developed by an employee of the recipient party who has no knowledge of the disclosure under this Agreement;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	required to be disclosed by a court, rule or governmental law or regulation, or the rules of any stock exchange, provided that the party making the disclosure provides
	prompt notice to the other party of any such requirement; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	f)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	it is required to be disclosed pursuant to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Incremental Total Revenue
</B>
	means all the revenues generated by Anisina (or other anti-tropomyosin candidate as agreed by Novogen and TKCP) in a calendar year, irrespective of the therapeutic
	indication.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Intellectual Property
</B>
	means all copyright, all rights in relation to inventions (including patent rights),
	plant varieties, registered and unregistered trademarks (including service marks), registered and unregistered designs, Confidential Information and circuit layouts and all other rights of intellectual property resulting from intellectual activity
	in the industrial, scientific, literary or artistic fields recognised in domestic law anywhere in the world.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Launch Date
</B>
	means the first day following the commercialisation of Anisina (or other anti-tropomyosin candidate as agreed by Novogen and TKCP), regardless of the therapeutic indication.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Milestone Payments
</B>
	means the lump sum payments from Novogen to TKCP of US$500,000 each, payable on the following dates:
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Paediatric Commercialisation Date
</B>
	means the first day following the commercialisation of Anisina (or
	other anti-tropomyosin candidate as agreed by Novogen and TKCP) in a paediatric indication.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Project
</B>
	means the phase 1
	clinical trial for Anisina (or other anti-tropomyosin candidate as agreed by Novogen and TKCP) as a treatment for a range of paediatric cancers.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Royalty Payments
</B>
	means the annual payment to be paid by Novogen to TKCP equivalent to:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	(i)
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
</B>
	0.5% of the Incremental Total Revenue generated by Anisina (or other anti-tropomyosin candidate as agreed by Novogen and TKCP) for revenue that is above A$10m
	and up to A$50m in the relevant year, with effect from the Launch Date up until the Paediatric Commercialisation Date; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	(ii)
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
</B>
	1% of the Incremental Total Revenue generated by Anisina (or other anti-tropomyosin candidate as agreed by Novogen and TKCP) for revenue that is above A$10m and
	up to A$50m in the relevant year, with effect from the Paediatric Commercialisation Date
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Unless the context otherwise requires:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a word which denotes the singular denotes the plural and vice versa;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	where a word or phrase is given a particular meaning, other parts of speech and grammatical forms of that word or phrase have corresponding meanings;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	any use of the verb &#145;includes&#146;, or of words such as &#145;for example&#146; or &#145;such as&#146;, do not limit anything else that is included in general
	speech; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to any legislation includes that legislation as amended, re-enacted consolidated or substituted; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

</FONT>
</TD>

	a reference to a person includes a partnership and a body whether corporate or otherwise.

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	OBLIGATIONS OF NOVOGEN
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	3.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Novogen agrees to:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:5%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a) Ensure
	that the funds paid by TKCP to Novogen are only used for the purposes of the Project;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b) Be responsible for the preparation
	and submission of all documentation to both regulatory authorities and hospital review boards as required for the Project;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
	Manage the Project in accordance with the Clinical Trial Research Agreement;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	d) Subject to conditions in section 5,
<I>
	Funding Details
</I>
	, refund to TKCP the costs associated with the Project as contributed by TKCP and as agreed in the Budget;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	e) Pay for the costs of any pre-clinical studies, as required;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	f) Pay any amount
	in relation to the Project that exceeds the amount agreed in the Budget, including all costs associated with the use of Anisina (or other anti-tropomyosin candidate as agreed by Novogen and TKCP) for adult indications;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	g) Ensure that the costs associated with the Project are within the Budget and to minimise those costs for TKCP;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	h) Bear the cost and responsibility of filing all documentation to achieve marketing approval by the TGA, FDA and EMA;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	i) Join forces with TKCP to jointly petition government for fee reductions and/or funding for trials in childhood cancers; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:10%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	j) Provide potential future sponsorship to TKCP.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

	OBLIGATIONS OF TKCP
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

	&nbsp;

	4.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	TKCP agrees to:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Provide full funding of the Project in accordance to section 5 of this Agreement up to the maximum level set out within the Budget;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Seek support from other charitable organisations to support funding of the Project; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Join forces with Novogen to jointly petition government for fee reductions and/or funding for trial in childhood cancers.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>

</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">

</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Novogen will primarily incur and bear the costs in relation to the Project.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Novogen will provide TKCP with a quarterly report setting out funds used for the Project (including such other information as reasonably required by TKCP from time to
	time) and invoice TKCP monthly for the reimbursement of the costs paid in relation to the Project. Such reimbursement must occur within 30 days of receiving the invoice.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Commencing on the Paediatric Commercialisation Date, Novogen will make 3 Milestone Payments to TKCP in order to cover part of the costs associated with the Project.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Novogen will pay to TKCP the Royalty Payments commencing on the Launch Date and on each anniversary of the Launch Date up to and including the
	10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="1">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:BASELINE; POSITION:RELATIVE; BOTTOM:.8EX">
	th
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Anniversary of the Launch Date.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If a Change of Control occurs during the term of the Agreement, Novogen will use its best endeavours to honour its commitments as set out in this section 5.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>

</B>

</TD>

	INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	6.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	All Intellectual Property arising from the Project vests in Novogen from its creation and the parties will negotiate in good faith and determine at the time of signing
	the Clinical Trial Research Agreement the licensing arrangements which will apply post the Launch Date or such earlier time as agreed by the Parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

</B>

	SHARE OF INFORMATION
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>

<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

	or delayed.
</FONT>

<B>
	8.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	CLINICAL TRIAL RESEARCH AGREEMENT
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Parties agree to enter in a Clinical Trial Research Agreement at a later stage, which will include all the relevant information and obligations regarding the
	clinical trial as well as the Budget.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	8.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Clinical Trial Research Agreement will be applied in conjunction with this Agreement, unless specified otherwise.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	TERMINATION
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	9.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Prior to the Launch Date, a party may terminate this Agreement by the provision of 60 days notice to the other party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	9.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A party may terminate this Agreement immediately by notice to the other if that party:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	commits a breach of any material term of this Agreement and, if the breach is capable of remedy, fails to remedy the breach within 30 days after being required to do so
	in writing by the non-breaching party; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	goes into liquidation, has a receiver or receiver and manager appointed to it or any part of its assets, enters into a scheme of arrangement with creditors or suffers
	any other form of external administration.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	9.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If the Agreement is terminated by TKCP pursuant to clause 9.2, Novogen will refund to TKCP any funds paid by TKCP to Novogen under this Agreement up until the time of
	termination of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	9.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If Novogen terminates this Agreement in accordance with section 9.1, it shall reimburse TKCP for the costs incurred (including funds paid by TKCP to Novogen pursuant to
	this Agreement), as agreed in the Budget, up to the date of termination, provided that the termination was not triggered by the failure of the Project.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

	the benefit of the waiver.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Waiver by a party of anything that another party must do under this Agreement is not a waiver of any other right or entitlement under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

	12.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A failure or delay in exercising a right arising from a breach of this Agreement is not a waiver of that right.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<B>
	13.

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	DISPUTE RESOLUTION
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	13.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	No party may start arbitration, tribunal or court proceedings (except proceedings seeking interlocutory relief) in respect of a dispute unless it has first complied
	with this clause.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	13.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The parties will use their best endeavours to co-operatively resolve a dispute.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	13.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A party to this Agreement claiming that a dispute has arisen out of or in relation to this Agreement must give written notice (Notice) to the other party specifying the
	nature of the dispute.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	13.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If the parties do not agree within seven days of receipt of the Notice (or such further period as agreed in writing by them) as to:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the dispute resolution technique (e.g. expert determination) and procedures to be adopted;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the timetable for all steps in those procedures; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the selection and compensation of the independent person required for such technique,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the parties must mediate the dispute in accordance with the Mediation Rules of the Law Society of New South Wales, and, the President of the Law Society of New South
	Wales or the President&#146;s nominee will select the mediator and determine the mediator&#146;s remuneration.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	14.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	GENERAL
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This Agreement may only be varied in writing, signed by all the parties.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A party must not assign its rights or obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">

<TR>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between the parties in relation to its subject matter and supersedes any previous agreement of the parties, or any other
	communication or representation made, in relation to its subject matter.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	If a provision of this Agreement is invalid, illegal or unenforceable, then to the extent of the invalidity, illegality or unenforceability, that provision must be
	ignored in the interpretation of this Agreement.&nbsp;All other provisions of this Agreement remain in full force and effect.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	A party may execute this Agreement by signing a counterpart.&nbsp;All counterparts constitute one document, when taken together.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.6
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Each party must:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	do or cause to be done all acts and things necessary or desirable to give effect to; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	refrain from doing all acts and things that could hinder performance by any party of, this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.7
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Each party is to pay its own costs, charges and expenses in entering into this Agreement.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.8
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This Agreement binds and benefits the parties, their respective successors and permitted assigns.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.9
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Unless this Agreement provides otherwise, a party has no right of set-off against a payment due to another party.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.10
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	This Agreement is governed by and must be construed in accordance with the laws of New South Wales.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	14.11
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Each party:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	irrevocably and unconditionally submits to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of New South Wales and all courts that have jurisdiction to hear appeals from
	them; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	waives any right to object to proceedings being brought in those courts for any reason.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="eolPage337"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	NOVOGEN LIMITED
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	ACN 063 259 754
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	RULES OF THE NOVOGEN LIMITED EMPLOYEE SHARE OPTION PLAN
</B>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	INTERPRETATION AND OBJECT
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Definitions
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In these
	Rules, unless the context otherwise requires:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Acceptance Form
</B>
	&#148; means a form for the acceptance of the
	invitation made by the Committee to the Participant to participate in the Plan under clause 3.1 in such form as is approved by the Committee from time to time;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Associated Company
</B>
	&#148; means:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	any company that is a related body corporate of the Company; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	any company in which the Company has voting power in no less than 20% of the voting shares;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	ASTC
</B>
	&#148; means ASX Settlement and Transfer Corporation Pty Ltd;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	ASX
</B>
	&#148; means ASX Limited;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Board
</B>
	&#148; means the board of Directors of the Company from time to time;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Business Day
</B>
	&#148; means a day which is a &#147;business day&#148; for the purposes of the Listing Rules;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Change in Control
</B>
	&#148; means:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a person obtaining voting power in more than 30% of the voting shares of the Company; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a person ceasing to have voting power in more than 30% of the voting shares of the Company; or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Board resolving that it considers that a person who previously had not been in a position to do so, is in the position, directly or indirectly, and either alone or
	with associates to remove one-half or more of the Directors;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Change in Control Period
</B>
	&#148; means,
	in relation to a Change in Control, the 20 Business Days after the day on which the Change in Control occurred;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	CHESS
</B>
	&#148; means the Clearing House Electronic Subregister System operated by ASTC, and includes any applicable clearing and
	settlement facility that is a prescribed CS facility under the Corporations Act.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Committee
</B>
	&#148; means the Board
	or, if a committee is appointed by the Board as contemplated by clause 2.1, that committee;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148; means
	Novogen Limited ACN 063 259 754;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Corporations Act
</B>
	&#148; means the Corporations Act 2001 (Cth);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;

</P>
<A NAME="eolPage338"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Director
</B>
	&#148; means a director of the Company from time to time;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Employee
</B>
	&#148; means an employee (full time or part time) or officer of the Company or an Associated Company;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Exercise Condition
</B>
	&#148; means, in respect of an Option, one or more conditions which must be met before the Option may be
	exercised;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Exercise Period
</B>
	&#148; means, in respect of an Option, each of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	each day which is after the Vesting Period and before the end of the Option Period;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	each Takeover Period during the Option Period; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	each Change in Control Period during the Option Period;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Exercise Price
</B>
	&#148; means in respect of an Option, the subscription price on exercise of the Option determined in accordance with clauses&nbsp;2.4 and 3.1 in relation to that Option (as
	adjusted under clause 6);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Group
</B>
	&#148; means the Company and ail Associated Companies;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Holder
</B>
	&#148; means in respect of an Option, the person registered as holder of the Option in the register of options
	maintained by the Company;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Listing Rules
</B>
	&#148; means the listing rules of ASX as they may apply to the Company
	from time to time;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Option
</B>
	&#148; means an option to subscribe under the Plan for one fully paid Share (as adjusted
	under clause 6);
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">

<B>
	Option Certificate
</B>
	&#148; means the certificate issued by the Company to a Holder in respect of
	an Option;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Option Period
</B>
	&#148; means, in respect of an Option, subject to clause 5.6, the period starting on the
	date on which the Company grants the Option and ending, unless another period is specified in the invitation made in relation to that Option under clause 3:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;

	a)

	on the fifth anniversary of that date; or
</FONT>

</FONT>

</FONT>
</TD>

</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">

	Participant

	Record Date
</B>
	&#148; has the meaning given to it by the Listing Rules;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Share
</B>
	&#148; means an ordinary share in the Company;
</FONT>

	&#148; means:

	a)
</FONT>
</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	for a takeover bid under Chapter 6 of the Corporations Act, the &#147;offer period&#148; as defined in section 9 of the Corporations Act; and

	under part 5.1 of the Corporations Act, 30 Business Days from when a Court sanctions a compromise or arrangement proposed for the purpose or in connection with, a
	scheme for the reconstruction of the Company or its amalgamation with another body corporate.
</FONT>
</TD>

<A NAME="eolPage339"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Trading Rules
</B>
	&#148; means the Listing Rules, any other rules of ASX applying to
	the Company while it is admitted to the official list of ASX, and the ASTC settlement rules (or other operating rules) as amended or replaced from time to time; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	&#147;
<B>
	Vesting Period
</B>
	&#148; means, in respect of an Option, the period of two years after the date of grant or another period determined by the Committee (either generally or in a particular case).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	General
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In these Rules,
	unless the context otherwise requires:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to any legislation or legislative provision includes any statutory modification or re-enactment of, or legislative provision substituted for, and any
	subordinate legislation issued under, that legislation or legislative provision:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the singular includes the plural and vice versa;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to an individual or person includes a corporation, partnership, joint venture, association, authority, trust, state or government and vice versa;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to any gender includes ail genders;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a clause, schedule or annexure is to a clause, schedule or annexure of or to these Rules;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	f)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a schedule or annexure forms part of these Rules;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	g)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to any agreement or document (including, without limitation, these Rules) is to that agreement or document (and, where applicable, any of its provisions) as
	amended, novated, supplemented or replaced from time to time;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	h)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	where an expression is defined, another part of speech or grammatical form of that expression has a corresponding meaning;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to a &#147;related body corporate&#148; of a body corporate is to a body corporate which is related to that body corporate within the meaning of section 50
	of the Corporations Act;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	j)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to an &#147;associate&#148; of a person is to:
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	i)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a person acting in concert with the first person,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	ii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a person controlled, directly or indirectly, by the first person, or
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="8%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	iii)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a person who acts in accordance with the directions, instructions or wishes of the first person,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	in respect of the matter to which the reference to an associate relates;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	5
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage340"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	k)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to &#147;dollars&#148; or &#147;$&#148; is to Australian currency;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	l)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to bankruptcy or winding up includes bankruptcy, winding up, liquidation, dissolution, becoming an insolvent under administration (as defined in section 9
	of the Corporations Act), the appointment of an administrator and the occurrence of anything analogous or having a substantially similar effect to any of those conditions or matters under the law of any applicable jurisdiction, and to the
	procedures, circumstances and events which constitute any of those conditions or matters; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	m)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a reference to &#147;amendment&#148; includes addition, alteration, deletion, extension, modification and variation.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Headings
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In these Rules,
	headings are for convenience of reference only and do not affect interpretation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	1.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Object of Plan
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The
	object of the Plan is to assist in the recruitment, reward, retention and motivation of employees of the Group.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:18PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	ADMINISTRATION
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.1
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Committee&#146;s authority
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Board or a committee appointed by the Board for the purpose under the constitution of the Company may manage and administer the Plan
	for the Company and the Committee has ail powers necessary to do so.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.2
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Total number of Shares
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	At any time, the aggregate of:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the total number of Shares which the Company would have to issue if all Options granted under this Plan which have not lapsed were exercised; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the total number of Shares which the Company would have to issue if all options which have been granted under employee incentive schemes of the Company, which have not
	lapsed were exercised; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the total number of Shares issued under employee incentive schemes of the Company during the period of 5 years preceding that time,
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	must not exceed 5 per cent of the number of issued Shares at that time (whether fully paid or partly paid).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In working out the aggregate number of Shares the Company can issue, disregard any Share or option for a Share or option for a Share
	acquired or Share issued:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	to or by a person situated outside Australia at time of receipt of the offer;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	6
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage341"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	by way of or as a result of an excluded offer or invitation within the meaning in the Corporations Law as it stood before 13&nbsp;March 2000; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	by way of or as a result of an offer which does not need disclosure to investors because of section 708 of the Corporations Act.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.3
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Determination of eligibility
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	The Committee may from time to time in its absolute discretion decide:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	that an Employee is eligible to participate in the Plan;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	whether or not the Participant is already a Holder) the number of Options for which the Participant may at that time be invited to apply;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Exercise Conditions (if any) to be applicable to the Options for which the Participant may at that time be invited to apply.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	In making these determinations, the Committee must consider:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Employee&#146;s position with the Group and the services provided to the Group by the Employee;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Employee&#146;s record of employment or service with the Group;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	c)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Employee&#146;s potential contribution to the growth of the Group;
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	d)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	any other matters which tend to indicate the Employee&#146;s merit; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	e)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the terms of any offer made to the Employee to become an employee.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.4
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Determination of price
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	When the Committee decides to invite a Participant to apply for an Option, it must, in its absolute discretion (but subject to clause 6),
	also determine the Exercise Price for that Option subject to any restrictions in the Listing Rules.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	2.5
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
<B>
	Disputes
</B>
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX; MARGIN-LEFT:4%">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	Any dispute or
	difference of any nature arising in relation to the Plan:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	a)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	must be referred to the Committee; and
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PX;MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	b)
</FONT>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	the Committee&#146;s decision on that dispute or difference is final and binding on the Company, the participants and the Holders in all respects.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX">
<FONT SIZE="1">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PX;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PX" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" SIZE="2">
	7
</FONT>
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage342"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
